title: Freezing champion select on 0 seconds
body:
Went to play a game this morning, not sure if anyone else has been having this problem but as the game is about to launch, the champion select freezes on 0 seconds. Please help riot, thanks
Yo, while you're all waiting check out my new page, running gift card competitions may as well give it a look seeing league won't load :p 
https://www.facebook.com/Gekkoh-Giveaways-175444466144365/

replies.body: was stuck on champ sel whole team was still there after 0 sec rip {{item:3073}}
you cant dodge and open lol again because the reconnect button comes up. BUT IT DOESNT EVEN WORK.

Tried to reconnect.. Can't even reconnect to the game. Clicking reconnect does nothing -_-
This sucks :(
I CANT EVEN RECONNECT EITHER
Stuck in champ select screen as we speak :I((((((((((((((
omg me 2
RIOT PLS
Can confirm

Hey everyone,

Apologies for the inconvenience. Check the sticky post - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/TEEeBys5-resolved-server-issues-21st-jan-2015

Should be fixed now.
this happened to me and also all the players in my game but there was two that did not connect on my team :( good old 3v5
Got the same problem. Had to play a 5v2 and lost obviously. Got a loss prevented - dunno if it'll work on a placement tho.
i can reconnect now atleast after logging out and loggin back in a few times
I've been stuck for about 20 minutes, nothing has happened so far still waiting{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
its just started the game. looks like it might be a 2v1 hahaha

> [{quoted}](name=SpongeHands,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=aNzVTGyF,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2016-01-21T00:45:17.855+0000)
>
> its just started the game. looks like it might be a 2v1 hahaha

Ah shit. now its 4v2 vs our team. f u  riot haha
Its back in you have to wait around 5 mins and it automatically goes into game without pressing reconnect
Spaghetti Code
Just started working again
yea same for me....{{item:3073}} {{champion:51}}
Same here, what the hell is happening? {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Waiting for RITO official response!
We all are ..

Pls rito help us{{item:3070}}

im finaly in thx <3
